vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
VAIUnitroller.fallback (VAIControllerG1.sol#2989-3004) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = vaiControllerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (VAIControllerG1.sol#2991-2993)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
VAIUnitrollerAdminStorage.admin (VAIControllerG1.sol#2806-2808) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- _initializeVenusVAIState (VAIControllerG1.sol#3317-3333)
	- _setComptroller (VAIControllerG1.sol#3386-3399)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (VAIControllerG1.sol#1263-1324) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (VAIControllerG1.sol#1289)
	-transferFrom (VAIControllerG1.sol#1303)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._addReservesInternal (VAIControllerG1.sol#2571-2583):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2572-2573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (VAIControllerG1.sol#2579-2580)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._reduceReserves (VAIControllerG1.sol#2634-2644):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2635-2636)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (VAIControllerG1.sol#2641-2642)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setComptroller (VAIControllerG1.sol#2503-2522):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (VAIControllerG1.sol#2511-2512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (VAIControllerG1.sol#2514-2515)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setInterestRateModel (VAIControllerG1.sol#2699-2709):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2700-2701)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (VAIControllerG1.sol#2706-2707)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (VAIControllerG1.sol#2706-2707)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (VAIControllerG1.sol#2715-2745):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (VAIControllerG1.sol#2734-2736)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (VAIControllerG1.sol#2737-2739)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._setReserveFactor (VAIControllerG1.sol#2527-2537):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2528-2529)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (VAIControllerG1.sol#2534-2535)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.accrueInterest (VAIControllerG1.sol#1709-1787):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (VAIControllerG1.sol#1726)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (VAIControllerG1.sol#1778)
	- borrowIndex (VAIControllerG1.sol#1779)
	- totalBorrows (VAIControllerG1.sol#1780)
	- totalReserves (VAIControllerG1.sol#1781)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.borrowInternal (VAIControllerG1.sol#2065-2073):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2066)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (VAIControllerG1.sol#2072)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (VAIControllerG1.sol#2072)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.initialize (VAIControllerG1.sol#1351-1382):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (VAIControllerG1.sol#1365)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (VAIControllerG1.sol#1369)
	- borrowIndex (VAIControllerG1.sol#1370)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (VAIControllerG1.sol#2277-2292):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2278)
	- error = vTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (VAIControllerG1.sol#2284)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,vTokenCollateral) (VAIControllerG1.sol#2291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
